  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AmenitiesLoader
    Utility service responsible for loading amenities from a CSV file.
    ApplicantApplicationService
    Handles application-related features for applicants in the BTO system.
    ApplicantEligibilityService
    Service responsible for validating an applicant's eligibility to apply for a housing project.
    ApplicantFeedbackService
    Lets applicants submit feedback for the project they applied to.
    ApplicantInvoiceService
    Handles everything related to applicant invoices.
    ApplicantMenu
    Displays the menu and handles input actions for logged-in applicants.
    ApplicantProjectViewService
    Helps applicants view and filter available housing projects.
    ApplicantReceiptService
    Handles viewing of payment receipts by applicants.
    AuthService
    Handles authentication and account-related services for Applicants, Officers, and Managers.
    EnquireService
    Provides services related to project enquiries, including submitting, editing, deleting, and responding to enquiries for applicants and HDB personnel.
    FeedbackAnalyticsService
    Provides analytics and insights on feedback data, both globally and per manager.
    FeedbackService
    Provides functionality for submitting, retrieving, filtering, and resolving feedback.
    InvoiceService
    Handles invoice operations such as adding, retrieving, and updating invoices.
    ManagerApplicantApprovalService
    Provides services for HDB managers to review, approve/reject applicant submissions, and handle applicant withdrawal requests for their projects.
    ManagerEnquiryService
    Provides services for HDB managers to handle and respond to applicant enquiries.
    ManagerFeedbackService
    Provides functionality for HDB managers to view, filter, and resolve feedback submitted by applicants for the manager's assigned projects.
    ManagerMenu
    Displays the CLI dashboard for HDB managers and handles routing to various services.
    ManagerOfficerApprovalService
    Handles the approval workflow of HDB officers by project managers.
    ManagerProjectService
    Provides functionality for HDB managers to manage their housing projects.
    ManagerReportService
    Provides a additional CLI-based interface for HDB Managers to generate, view, and filter booking reports.
    OfficerAmenityService
    Handles the management of project amenities by an HDB officer.
    OfficerBookingService
    Handles the booking of flats by HDB officers for applicants.
    OfficerEnquiryService
    Handles enquiry-related actions for HDB officers.
    OfficerInvoiceService
    Provides functionality for officers to retrieve invoices that are awaiting receipt generation.
    OfficerLocationService
    Provides functionality for officers to update the location details of their assigned HDB project, including address and geolocation.
    OfficerMenu
    CLI menu interface for logged-in HDB Officers.
    OfficerProjectViewService
    Provides view-related functionality for officers to inspect details about their assigned HDB project.
    OfficerReceiptService
    Service implementation for HDB officers to manage and generate receipts for invoices.
    OfficerRegistrationService
    Provides functionality for HDB Officers to handle registration-related tasks.
    PaymentService
    Service class responsible for managing payment-related operations.
    ProjectLoader
    Utility service class responsible for loading Project data from CSV, and enriching each project with its associated list of amenities.
    ReceiptService
    Responsible for managing receipt operations including creation, retrieval, and lookups from both in-memory and CSV storage.
    RegistrationService
    Handles the registration process for new applicants.
    ReportService
    Service class for handling report generation, filtering, and display.
